turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. Hi. Today I need your help ordering some coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm looking to order a cappuccino with added chocolate springs as well as some whipped cream on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to add 1% milk, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: they have 2% milk but not 1% milk, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, 2% of 2% is okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, what size did you want that in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to get a medium.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: by medium do you mean tall or grande?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I actually I'd like a tall.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, so you are ordering a tall cappcucino with 2% whipped cream and extra chocolate sprinkles, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm going to be in Oklahoma City.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, let me find a Starbucks there.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will you be close to south oklahoma avenue?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually I think I will be probably about 5 minutes from there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok great, i'll send your order to that location, one moment please.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a tall cappuccino with 2% and whipped cream as well as chocolate sprinkles, to be picked up at the Starbucks on south oklahoma avenue, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, I think that's pretty that pretty much covers it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, enjoy your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you for your help today in finding this coffee.
